thread.section_title: Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great boutique hotel!
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel! - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Isabelcardwell
title: Great boutique hotel!
text: Mother & daughter trip. We spent 10 days in London and Paris and by far this was the best hotel. Amazing staff. They were very helpful with suggestions for great restaurants. They made my daughter a cup of chamomile tea when she wasn't feeling well and brought it up to our room. They pay attention to the little details. They even gave us a box of homemade madelines to take on the train with us. Loved it!
